oai_dc:dc.dc:title: A general and efficient aldehyde decarbonylation reaction by using a palladium catalyst
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: MODAK, A
DEB, A
PATRA, T
RANA, S
MAITY, S
MAITI, D
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: NOBLE METAL COMPOUNDS
KHAND-TYPE REACTION
MEDIATED DEFORMYLATION
OLEFIN METATHESIS
ORGANIC SYNTHESES
MILD CONDITIONS
CARBONYLATION
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A facile decarbonylation reaction of aldehydes has been developed by employing Pd(OAc)(2). A wide variety of substrates are decarbonylated, without using any exogenous ligand for palladium as well as CO-scavenger.
